title: Bloomberg Markets: Schutz on 'Mediocre' Bank Earnings
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Schutz on 'Mediocre' Bank Earnings
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Anton Schutz\u0010President\u0010Mendon Capital Advisors \u0010Discussing earnings from Bank of America and First Republic Bank, as well as his outlook for regional banks.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
